publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7352 Maureen Watt: Marine Stewardship Council Certification for North Sea Haddock—That the Parliament congratulates the sustainable fishing efforts of Scotland’s fishermen in successfully achieving Marine Stewardship Council certification of North Sea haddock; notes that North Sea haddock is the first Scottish whitefish to be certified with the gold standard of sustainability, and applauds the efforts of the Scottish fishing industry to ensure that Scotland stays at the forefront of developing innovative ways to manage fisheries and continues to lead the rest of Europe in sustainable fishing practices.

S3M-7352 Maureen Watt: Marine Stewardship Council Certification for North Sea Haddock—That the Parliament congratulates the sustainable fishing efforts of Scotland’s fishermen in successfully achieving Marine Stewardship Council certification of North Sea haddock; notes that North Sea haddock is the first Scottish whitefish to be certified with the gold standard of sustainability, and applauds the efforts of the Scottish fishing industry to ensure that Scotland stays at the forefront of developing innovative ways to manage fisheries and continues to lead the rest of Europe in sustainable fishing practices.
S3M-7352 Marine Stewardship Council Certification for North Sea Haddock (lodged on 4 November 2010) Rob Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Brian Adam*, Sandra White*, Alasdair Allan*
S3M-7352 Marine Stewardship Council Certification for North Sea Haddock (lodged on 4 November 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
